metadata.Name: First French COVID19 Lockdown Twitter Dataset
metadata.Description: This dataset contains tweets collected during the first French COVID-19 lockdown (March 17 - May 11, 2020).
metadata.Paper Title: The First French COVID19 Lockdown Twitter Dataset
metadata.Abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic has led to an unprecedented surge in online discussions, particularly on social media platforms like Twitter. In this paper, we present the first French COVID-19 lockdown Twitter dataset, collected during the period of March 17 to May 11, 2020. This dataset comprises over 1.6 million tweets in French, offering a valuable resource for researchers interested in studying public opinion, sentiment, and the spread of information during a public health crisis. We provide a detailed description of the dataset, including its collection methodology, characteristics, and potential applications. We also discuss the ethical considerations associated with using social media data for research purposes.
